metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

Bastion Host Summary tab: The view here uses data from Azure Resource Graph (ARG)  
Connections tab: The views on this tab utilise data from the following Azure Monitor (Log Analytics) Tables:
* AzureBastionAuditLogs
* AzureActivity

You will not see any information unless you have enabled the Diagnostic Settings for the Azure Bastion Hosts. To enable Diagnostic Settings, please refer to the [following documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/bastion/diagnostic-logs#enable)."},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"Help","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Yes"},"name":"helptext"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"## Change Log

"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"Help","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Change Log"},"name":"text - 18"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"## Spacer"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"_","comparison":"isNotEqualTo"},"name":"text - 6 - Copy"},{"type":11,"content":{"version":"LinkItem/1.0","style":"tabs","links":[{"id":"75e3c3a4-06ac-4285-b060-15e24c4f0a31","cellValue":"selectedTab","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"Bastion Host Summary","subTarget":"Hosts","preText":"Hosts","style":"link"},{"id":"ce07bfee-3c54-41aa-bc89-f8de8cc73c74","cellValue":"selectedTab","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"Connections","subTarget":"Connections","preText":"Connections","style":"link"}]},"name":"links - 9"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
| where type == "microsoft.network/bastionhosts"
| parse properties.ipConfigurations[0].properties.subnet with * 'virtualNetworks/' bastionvnet '/' dumpdata
| project ['Bastion id']=id, ['Bastion Name']=name, ['Azure Region']=location, ['Resource Group']=resourceGroup, ['Virtual Network']=bastionvnet, ['Tags']=tags, ['Raw Data']=properties","size":1,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{subscription}"],"gridSettings":{"filter":true}},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"selectedTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Hosts"},"name":"query - 3"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"### Queries below used to collect data for the merge query"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"_","comparison":"isNotEqualTo"},"name":"text - 6"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"MicrosoftAzureBastionAuditLogs
| summarize count() by _ResourceId, UserName, Protocol, TargetVMIPAddress","size":4,"title":"connectionsforMerge","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"timeContextFromParameter":"timerange","exportFieldName":"_ResourceId","exportParameterName":"bastionid","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{workspace}"]},"customWidth":"50","conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"_","comparison":"isNotEqualTo"},"name":"query - connectionsbyuser","styleSettings":{"maxWidth":"50"}},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"Resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
| extend nics=array_length(properties.networkProfile.networkInterfaces) 
| mv-expand nic=properties.networkProfile.networkInterfaces 
| where nics == 1 or nic.properties.primary =~ 'true' or isempty(nic) 
| project vmId = id, vmName = name, nicId = tostring(nic.id)
| join kind=leftouter (
	Resources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.network/networkinterfaces'
    | extend ipConfigsCount=array_length(properties.ipConfigurations) 
    | mv-expand ipconfig=properties.ipConfigurations 
    | where ipConfigsCount == 1 or ipconfig.properties.primary =~ 'true'
    | project nicId = id, privateIp = tostring(ipconfig.properties.privateIPAddress))
on nicId
| project vmId, vmName, privateIp","size":4,"title":"vmIpforMerge","queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{subscription}"]},"customWidth":"50","conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"_","comparison":"isNotEqualTo"},"name":"query - | order by TimeGenerated
// maybe add other data for this details view","size":0,"title":"Details - Connections by Time Slice {tbCountbyConnection:label}","timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"tbCountbyConnection","timeBrushParameterName":"tbCountbyConnection","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{workspace}"],"visualization":"table","tileSettings":{"showBorder":false,"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"OperationName","formatter":1},"leftContent":{"columnMatch":"count_","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"palette":"auto"},"numberFormat":{"unit":17,"options":{"maximumSignificantDigits":3,"maximumFractionDigits":2}}}}},"conditionalVisibilities":[{"parameterName":"workspace","comparison":"isNotEqualTo","value":""},{"parameterName":"selectedTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Connections"}],"name":"query - countbyconnection - Copy"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"AzureActivity 
| where OperationNameValue == "MICROSOFT.NETWORK/BASTIONHOSTS/GETACTIVESESSIONS/ACTION" and ActivitySubstatusValue == "Accepted"
| project TimeGenerated, _ResourceId, Caller, CallerIpAddress
| join 
(
MicrosoftAzureBastionAuditLogs
| where Message == "Successfully Disconnected"
)
on $left.CallerIpAddress == $right.ClientIpAddress
| extend SessionTimeMins=datetime_diff('minute',todatetime(SessionEndTime),SessionStartTime)
| project Caller, _ResourceId, ClientIpAddress, TargetVMIPAddress, Protocol, SessionStartTime, SessionEndTime, SessionTimeMins","size":0,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Bastion Connections by Caller","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"timeContextFromParameter":"timerange","showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{workspace}"],"gridSettings":{"filter":true,"labelSettings":[{"columnId":"_ResourceId","label":"Bastion Used"},{"columnId":"ClientIpAddress","label":"Source IP Address"},{"columnId":"TargetVMIPAddress","label":"Target VM IP Address"},{"columnId":"SessionTimeMins","label":"Duration (Mins)"}]}},"conditionalVisibilities":[{"parameterName":"selectedTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Connections"},{"parameterName":"workspace","comparison":"isNotEqualTo"}],"name":"query - 8"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"AzureActivity 
| where OperationNameValue == "MICROSOFT.NETWORK/BASTIONHOSTS/GETACTIVESESSIONS/ACTION" and ActivitySubstatusValue == "Accepted"
| project TimeGenerated, _ResourceId, Caller
| join kind=leftouter (
    MicrosoftAzureBastionAuditLogs
    | where Message == "Successfully Connected."
    | summarize count() by _ResourceId, TimeGenerated, UserName, Protocol, TargetVMIPAddress, ClientIpAddress)
on _ResourceId
//| summarize count(), make_set(Caller), dcount(Caller) by _ResourceId, ClientIpAddress, UserName, Protocol, ['Target VM IP']=TargetVMIPAddress, TimeGenerated
| summarize count(), dcount(Caller) by _ResourceId, ClientIpAddress, UserName, Protocol, ['Target VM IP']=TargetVMIPAddress, TimeGenerated","size":0,"aggregation":5,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Bastion Connection by Callers","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"timeContextFromParameter":"timerange","timeBrushParameterName":"tbSuccessfulConnection","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{workspace}"],"visualization":"timechart","chartSettings":{"seriesLabelSettings":[{"seriesName":"count_","label":"Successful Connection Count"},{"seriesName":"dcount_Caller","label":"Unique User Count"}],"ySettings":{"numberFormatSettings":{"unit":17,"options":{"style":"decimal","useGrouping":true}}}}},"conditionalVisibilities":[{"parameterName":"selectedTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Connections"},{"parameterName":"workspace","comparison":"isNotEqualTo"}],"name":"query-azureactivitycaller - Copy"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"AzureActivity 
| where OperationNameValue == "MICROSOFT.NETWORK/BASTIONHOSTS/GETACTIVESESSIONS/ACTION" and ActivitySubstatusValue == "Accepted"
| project TimeGenerated, _ResourceId, Caller
| join kind=leftouter (
    MicrosoftAzureBastionAuditLogs
    | where Message == "Successfully Connected."
    | summarize count() by _ResourceId, TimeGenerated, UserName, Protocol, TargetVMIPAddress, ClientIpAddress)
on _ResourceId
//| project _ResourceId, ['Connection Initiated by']=Caller, ClientIpAddress, UserName, Protocol, ['Target VM IP']=TargetVMIPAddress, Count=count_
//| summarize count() by ['Connection Initiated by']=Caller, _ResourceId, ClientIpAddress, UserName, Protocol, ['Target VM IP']=TargetVMIPAddress //, Count=count_
| summarize count(), make_set(Caller), dcount(Caller) by _ResourceId, ClientIpAddress, UserName, Protocol, ['Target VM IP']=TargetVMIPAddress","size":0,"showAnalytics":true,"title":"Bastion Connection by Caller {tbSuccessfulConnection:label}","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"timeContextFromParameter":"timerange","showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{workspace}"],"gridSettings":{"filter":true,"labelSettings":[{"columnId":"_ResourceId","label":"Bastion Host"},{"columnId":"ClientIpAddress","label":"Source IP Address"},{"columnId":"UserName","label":"VM Username"},{"columnId":"Protocol"},{"columnId":"Target VM IP"},{"columnId":"count_"},{"columnId":"set_Caller","label":"Connection Initiator(s)"},{"columnId":"dcount_Caller","label":"Initiator Count"}]}},"conditionalVisibilities":[{"parameterName":"selectedTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Connections"},{"parameterName":"workspace","comparison":"isNotEqualTo"}],"name":"query-azureactivitycaller"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"AzureActivity 
| where OperationNameValue == "MICROSOFT.NETWORK/BASTIONHOSTS/GETACTIVESESSIONS/ACTION" and ActivitySubstatusValue == "Accepted"
| project TimeGenerated, _ResourceId, Caller, CallerIpAddress
| join 
(
 MicrosoftAzureBastionAuditLogs
 | where Message == "Successfully Connected."
 )
on $left.CallerIpAddress == $right.ClientIpAddress
//| order by TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated, _ResourceId, Caller, ClientIpAddress, UserName, TargetVMIPAddress, Protocol
| summarize count() by Caller, ClientIpAddress, UserName, Protocol, ['Target VM IP']=TargetVMIPAddress, TimeGenerated","size":0,"title":"Bastion Connections by User","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"timeContextFromParameter":"timerange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{workspace}"],"visualization":"linechart"},"conditionalVisibilities":[{"parameterName":"selectedTab","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"Connections"},{"parameterName":"workspace","comparison":"isNotEqualTo"}],"name":"query - 15"}]},"name":"group - 1"}],"isLocked":false,"fallbackResourceIds":["Azure Monitor"]}
